items.title: St. Joseph College of Communication, Mahatma Gandhi University
items.subtitle: B.A. in Animation and VFX

items.title: Flipshope
items.subtitle: Motion Graphic Designer and Video Editor
items.text:
I create engaging motion graphics and edit videos to enhance marketing and product communication strategies.
- Designed promotional videos that increased user engagement by 25%.
- Collaborated with the product team to produce animation for app tutorials.

items.title: Freelancer in Fiverr
items.subtitle: Animator & Graphic Designer (Level 2 seller)
items.text:
I design custom animations and graphics for clients globally, meeting unique creative needs and delivering top-notch visuals.
- Created over 100 projects for clients worldwide with a 5-star rating.
- Developed branding assets for startups that led to successful funding rounds.

items.title: Miss Audio Video
items.subtitle: Animator & Graphic Designer
items.text:
I produced animations and visual designs, collaborating with clients to craft compelling audiovisual content.
- Directed animations for corporate training modules used by Fortune 500 companies.
- Designed explainer videos that boosted client conversion rates by 30%.

items.title: Talent Throne
items.subtitle: Freelancer as Graphic Designer
items.text:
I provided freelance graphic design services, creating impactful visuals to elevate branding and communication efforts.
- Conceptualized and designed marketing materials for a successful product launch.
- Produced logos and brand guidelines for emerging businesses.
